title: Mathematics ICT-Integrated Instructional Design Considering Educational Environments in Developing Countries

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and basic smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: In PC-unavailable environments, smartphones serve as the primary learning tool, with asynchronous learning conducted via an LMS (Learning Management System).

learning_goals: Learners can explain five ICT-integrated instructional design principles suitable for educational environments in developing countries
Learners can design math problem-solving projects using smartphone-based tools
Learners can develop ICT-integrated lesson materials applicable in limited-technology environments
Learners can analyze and improve the outcomes of ICT-integrated lesson implementation through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
